>
[Ignitor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1151)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 88 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents have access to all uncommon clockwork items and gadgets from Chapters 1 and 2 of this book_

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

An ignitor uses interlocking clockwork to create a small spark in order to ignite flammable materials. While holding the ignitor, you can Interact with it to ignite a flammable object within reach.

</column>
